name: rename
description: Renames a field or multiple fields. Supports both single field renaming and bulk renaming using arrays.
syntax: | rename(old_field, as=new_field) OR | rename([[old1, new1], [old2, new2]])

parameters.name: field
parameters.description: The field to rename (single field syntax)

parameters.name: as
parameters.description: The new name for the field (single field syntax)

parameters.name: array
parameters.description: Array of [old_name, new_name] pairs for bulk renaming
